content: yarns she has been obsessed with colour and fibre since forever and blogging about it since 2004 when she s not playing with yarn she s chasing a toddler around the attic or hunting for new noodle shops with fourth stockinette st with colour e until the foot her husband she can easily be bribed knit 9 stitches from the heel turn replace a measures from the back of the heel to the with fish tacos stitch marker to mark the beginning of round sts on the needles 2 / 5 cm shorter than your desired total foot length remove the email felicia@sweetgeorgiayarns com work decreases for the gusset on every other beginning-of-round marker web www sweetgeorgiayarns com round as follows toe credits decrease round knit to last three sts before begin at right side of foot instep sts work the right foot marker k2tog k1 slip marker k32 design & photography toe decreases as follows top of foot slip marker k1 ssk knit to end of felicia lo round decrease round k1 ssk k to 3 sts before left technical editing foot marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk k continue decreasing for the gusset every katherine vaughan to 3 sts before right foot marker k2tog k1 60 other round until there are 32 sts on the sts bottom of the foot copyright knit 3 rounds all pattern text photography and charts at the same time as working gusset copyright sweetgeorgia yarns 2015 this decreases work the stripe pattern continuing repeat decrease round then knit 2 rounds material may not be shared or reprinted to join the yarn along the centre back seam twice 52 sts without the permission of the author after working 3/4 / 1 9 cm approx 9 rounds this pattern may not be used to produce of gusset decreases join colour d and work repeat decrease round then knit 1 round items for commercial purposes stripe pattern again three times 40 sts for pattern support please contact cut the yarn for colour c leaving at least an repeat decrease round on every round 5 info@sweetgeorgiayarns com 8 / 20 cm end times until there are 16 sts remaining 8 on top 8 on bottom of foot foot continue in stockinette stitch with colour d break yarn leaving an 8 / 20 cm tail graft for 1 5 / 3 8 cm approx 18 rounds across toe using kitchener stitch weave in yarn ends and trim after blocking join colour e and work stripe pattern again cut the yarn for colour d leaving at least enjoy an 8 / 20 cm end continue working in
